Typography

Every visual element of our brand says something about us — even down to the fonts we use and how we use them. The specific styles, sizes and weights communicate the essence of the brand and place our brand within a meaningful hierarchy.

Heading Usage

h1 - h3 can be used in $darkest-gray and $white only and all caps only.
They all use Open Sans $heading, uppercase .uppercase;, and font-weight of 200.

Page Title

h1. font-size: 3em; For use in lead areas only.

River heading

h2. font-size: 2em; For use as section, page or river headings.

Element heading

h3. font-size: 1.5em; For use as title or headings of elements. i.e. OfferBox, Value Props, Grid module elements, any grid style graphic element.

Subhead Usage

H4-h6 can be used in title case only.


They use Khand $subhead and a font-weight of 400.

Sub-heading

Accent to h1 or h2 Title

h4. font-size: 1.75em; For use as a sub-heading above or beneath an h1 or h2. Only to be used in $brand-primary, $gray-darkest or $white.

If used as accent to title it should be red and have no margin

Text Title

h5. font-size: 1.25em; For use as a title or heading within a text section. Can be used in $brand-primary or $gray-darkest.

Accent Text Title

h6

NEED TO ADD

body copy

Translation Preview

What will our headlines, subhead and body copy look like in various languages?

English

H2. An Example of a lead heading & words. Question?

h4. An Example of a sub-heading. Question?

Example of Copy Body Text. Exclamation!

Spanish

H2. Un ejemplo de una gran partida &. ¿Pregunta?

h4 . Un ejemplo de un subtítulo . ¿Pregunta?

Ejemplo de texto copia de cuerpo . ¡Exclamación!

Portugese

H2 . Um Exemplo de um cabeçalho grande &. Questão?

h4 . Um exemplo de uma sub -rubrica . Questão?

Exemplo de texto cópia do corpo . Exclamação!

Chinese

H2 。大標題示例 。題？

H4 。子標題的一個實例。題？

複製正文文本的例子。感嘆！

Annotations

Example of an annotation

add the class below to a p tag in order to produce a small annotation, copyright or legal disclaimer

.copyright

Lists

There is a pattern for a list content type available. When using the pattern or inputting a list elsewhere there are options for styling. The default is discs and in order to have the correct alignment you'll need to add

There is an option for checks and x's but those should only be used in tables. Example:
for check marks and
to get the x's
